content: Channel the power of mighty Thor during bathroom trips with this Thor’s Hammer toilet paper holder. It’s designed like the iconic Mjölnir and comes inscribed with the saying “whoever sits here and holds this hammer shall possess the power of Thor”.

Experience the thrill of professional racing from the comfort of your living room with this full immersion racing simulator. It’s equipped with a 5-way adjustable cockpit in addition to Logitech G27 driving controls with feedback steering, a 6-speed shifter, and tri-pedal.

If you fancy yourself a wordsmith, put your skills to the ultimate test with Rewordable. In this entertaining and challenging card game players must combine different fragments to make up words – all the while being able to add and steal word cards from other players.

Level up your insect killing game by going pro with this bug zapper tennis racquet. This seemingly run-of-the-mill tennis racquet is actually a deadly weapon packed with over 100,000 lethal zaps that’ll fry those tiny bastards before they know what hit ’em.

The BittBoy handheld retro console is the ultra portable gaming device that lets you play all of your favorite Nintendo games on-the-go. It features a cool vintage design and loads classic NES, Game Boy, and Game Boy color games from a microSD card.

Easily achieve the perfect clean shave by swapping out your old clippers for the Pitbull hair clipper. It features a sensible and easy-to-grip design equipped with five separate flexible and independently articulating heads that will perfectly contour to your skull.

Unless you’re lucky enough to run into Rick and the gang, the Walking Dead Michonne themed katana is your best bet for surviving the apocalypse. This beautifully hand crafted sword stretches 40″ from end to end – but most importantly – it never runs out of ammo.

Keep a watchful eye over your domain 24/7 by installing the Kangaroo home security motion sensor inside your humble abode. It features a compact and discreet design that’ll seamlessly blend in with the decor and will instantly alert your phone when motion is detected.

The self-cleaning litter box helps you spend more time playing with your cat and less time cleaning up his stinky mess. It uses a special crystal litter that dehydrates solid waste to eliminate odors along with an automated raking system that ensures the box is always clean.

Stay visible while biking on the roads at night by strapping on this smart bicycle helmet. The ergonomic design provides a comfortable fit while built-in LEDs light up in the shape of turn signals and stop signs to better communicate your intentions to drivers.

titleEN: Desktop Monitor Stand Riser With Drawers
content: Reduce neck and eye strain during work by placing your monitor or laptop on this lovely wooden desktop stand riser. This quaint bamboo stand also comes fitted with some built-in slots and a couple of drawers so that you can keep all your possessions organized and at hand.

Punish your anus and permanently stain your bed sheets by bravely sprinkling in some “Shit The Bed” hot sauce onto your meals. It’s loaded with Scorpion chillies – the 3rd hottest chili in the world – along with a blend of varied herbs and spices.

These acne cover and treatment patches are ideal for those with troubled skin or unwanted scars. Designed to blend with all skin tones, the patch not only helps hide unsightly blemishes while protecting from dirt, but also absorbs pus and oil from the affected areas.

Keep your health and stamina at optimum levels during your gaming sessions by hydrating with this Fortnite Chug Jug water bottle. This BPA-free plastic bottle features game-accurate detailing and comes fitted with a handy silicone band so that you can grip it more easily.

titleEN: The No Monthly Fee GPS Pet Tracker
content: Keep a watchful eye over your furry friend without breaking the bank by using this no monthly fee GPS pet tracker. It employs a high-precision GPS to accurately track your pet’s location in real time, relaying the information to your smartphone.

Maximize your limited closet space to the fullest using these shoe space savers. The simple yet functional design of these storage units allow you to neatly stack a pair of shoes on top of each other – effectively doubling your closet space.

Increase your productivity by granting your smartphone or laptop full desktop capabilities with this 12-in-1 multi-port USB docking station. This versatile docking station allows you to connect your laptop to 2 different monitors and can transfer data at up to 5Gbps.

Forget couch cushions and bed sheets and set up the ultimate clubhouse for your kids with this big tree fort building kit. Ideal for indoor use, this whimsical cardboard tree comes with a hollowed out trunk that is large enough for several kids to play in simultaneously.

Paycheck burning a hole in your pocket? If so check out this awesome giant inflatable elephant! This ginormous 84-inch tall inflatable features a life-like appearance and is sturdy and durable enough to stay inflated for months without requiring attention.

Win the award for “parent of the year” by surprising your little cowpoke with this interactive pony scooter. This neat little pony makes over 100 unique sounds and movements and comes with a fully motorized head, eyes, and ears that make it look like he’s come to life.

Assure your most valuable possessions remain safe and sound by storing them inside this lock and roll under-bed personal safe. It boasts a high carbon steel lock and a sleek low profile design that makes it ideal for discreetly rolling under your bed.

Get your family snacking healthier by upgrading from those processed popcorn bags to this collapsible microwave popcorn maker. It’s large enough to make up to 14 cups and can collapse down to a slim 2-inch tall cylinder for easy storage.

Drink-A-Palooza is a Monopoly-type board game with beer pong, quarters, flip cup, and king’s cup all in one. This liver-destroying board game requires no fancy equipment and can be played with up to 12 people in teams of 2 – making it a college party must-have.

Keep your little slugger from making a mess when he goes number one by outfitting your toilet with this motion activated potty training bullseye. This handy accessory will help your little guy with his aim by providing him with a bright bullseye to focus on.

Facilitate the task of eating when you’re roughing it outdoors by packing your lunch in this 3-in-1 camping mess kit. This ultra portable kit includes a sturdy container with rubberized grips along with an attached multi-utensil so that you can eat like a civilized person.

Ensure all your naughty bits are nice and clean after an invigorating romp in the sack by using these AfterCourse post-sex wipes. These flushable wipes are the perfect way to tidy up and refresh yourself if you don’t have a shower nearby.

Ensure you have enough space to plug in all your devices while you travel by bringing along this revolutionary portable power strip. Smaller than an actual doughnut, this power strip manages to fit five outlets and two USB ports into its sleek design.

Leave your pots unattended without worrying about burning your food to a crisp by placing SAKI on the job. Designed to fit most saucepans, this wireless and ultra quiet appliance will ensure your sauces, soups, and meals are stirred to perfection.

Make any room come to life at night by giving it some quaint ambient lighting using this USB LED bottle light. This ultra portable light fits over almost any bottle – allowing you to transform it into an eye-catching lighting fixture that is ideal for indoor or outdoor use.

Ensure you’re breathing nothing but the cleanest air by outfitting your home using this air quality monitoring smart outlet. It tracks chemicals and toxins in the air while monitoring temperature and humidity which can be easily viewed on your smartphone.

For grilling and outdoor cookouts there’s virtually no tool more useful and versatile than this 12-in-1 kitchen multi-tool. This pocketknife-styled tool comes loaded with 12 handy and removable stainless steel kitchen utensils ranging from a spatula to a handy bottle opener.

Ensure your trusty specs are always handy by placing them on this magnetic eyeglasses holder. It easily attaches to any garment so that you can keep your eyeglasses, sunglasses, and even your headphones right by your side at all times.

Get to know the fastest Hunk of Junk in the galaxy as good as Han and Chewy with this Millennium Falcon book and mega model. You’ll learn the ins and outs of the legendary spacecraft and even get to build your very own Millennium Falcon model.

Living Off The Grid will show you how to effectively disconnect from society without having to sacrifice the joys of the modern world. The author shares his personal successes and failures so that you can live the off-grid lifestyle without being miserable.

Take back the night and enjoy the outdoors long after the sun sets by illuminating things with this outdoor telescopic fishing rod lamp. It conveniently connects to any 12V or car battery and can extend up to 12.3 feet into the air.

Keep a watchful eye over your pride and joy by monitoring their vitals with the Owlet smart sock 2 baby monitor. It tracks your baby’s vitals and relays pertinent information like heart rate and oxygen level right to your smartphone’s screen.

Kick your fiesta into high gear by giving it a kickass soundtrack with help from the JBL PartyBox 300. This high power portable wireless Bluetooth speaker features a playback time of 18 hours and lets you to connect up to 2 party speakers so that you can really raise the roof.

Meat lovers rejoice! Hardcore Carnivore is the protein-packed cookbook filled with a heap of delicious meat-centric recipes that will send your taste buds into heaven. Inside you’ll find dozens of recipes for preparing everything form chicken to lamb and beef.

Keep your tasty avocado from turning all nasty and brown by placing it inside this airtight guacamole storage container. The container is large enough to store up to 24 ounces and comes with a special lid that presses out all the air so that your guac stays nice and green.

Keep small valuables safe and sound during your next run by stashing them inside the runner’s pocket wristband. This adjustable and breathable high performance silicone band comes with a built-in pocket that is ideal for small items like cash and keys.

Add an extra line of security to your personal firearm with this smart gun lock. This caliber-specific lock easily attaches to your semi-automatic piece for instant locking and unlocking and will even send notifications to your phone if your gun has been tampered with.

Spice up your day with a little exotic flavor by snacking on this palate-pleasing roadkill sausage. This FDA-Approved summer hickory smoked summer sausage contains an assortment of savory meats ranging from rabbit and elk to pheasant and wild board.

Soak up the rays in utmost comfort by laying out on the BloChair inflatable chair. This fashionable chair is made from a tough and waterproof material that will hold up to 250 lbs and comes in 3 equally stunning colored glitter variations like gold, silver, and purple.

This succulent cactus pillow is perfect for adding some quaint natural charm to any drab room in your home. This uniquely designed 3D pillow comes in the form of a light green succulent cactus that is made from an incredibly soft and huggable microplush material.

If you thought Hello Kitty couldn’t get any sweeter you obviously haven’t checked out the Hello Kitty baking book yet. Inside you’ll find page after page of beautifully illustrated and easy-to-follow recipes that are ideal for kids and grown-ups alike.

Why settle for a boring rectangular speaker when you can build your very own mechanical spider Bluetooth speaker instead? This kit comes with everything you’ll require to construct your very own metallic arachnid speaker – complete with articulating legs.

Don’t throw out those bottle caps, because now you can recycle them into precious ammo! With a capacity for shooting bottle caps over 16 feet with the push of a button, you’ll be able to annoy anyone in the room without having to get up from your seat.

Keep your appearance looking as radiant as ever by pampering yourself with these real nature nourishing face masks. They’re made from soothing all-natural ingredients that will help with everything from firming to moisturizing depending what mask you apply.

Avoid misplacing your most used items by placing them inside this men’s valet organizer box. This bedroom must-have comes with a series of differently sized compartments so that you can store everything from your smartphone and keys to some spare change.

Spread buttery goodness all over your toast without tearing it to pieces by using this ribbon butter dispenser. This indispensable breakfast accessory will easily and quickly turn a solid stick of butter into a thin ribbon that is ideal for spreading on bread and toast.

The Lenovo Smart Tab P10 is the versatile Android tablet that also doubles as an Amazon Alexa enabled Smart Screen. Thanks to this versatile 2-in-1 you’ll easily be able to do everything from streaming movies and music to controlling your home’s smart appliances.

Turn almost any remote location into your own little slice of heaven by placing the flying saucer hanging hammock on a nearby tree branch. It’s made from a UV-protected mesh fabric and comes with a heavy duty 26′ rope so that you can easily hang it up.

On cold days, there’s no better way to lounge around the house than in one of these oversized hoodie sweatshirt blankets! These incredibly soft and roomy blankets come in a range of vibrant colors and feature a loose fit that make them great for indoor or outdoor use.

Confront your fears head-on with the pop-up book of phobias. This twisted work of genius features everything from the fear of clowns to the fear of doctors and needles, and puts you right in front of the action to experience your worst nightmare come to life.

Experience the high-paced action of your favorite game in real life by entering your next NERF battle armed with these Fortnite inspired blasters. They feature game-accurate detailing and come with a motorized blasting reel and acceleration button.

titleEN: Nuts ‘N More High Protein Nut Butter
content: Keep your gains up – even during snack time – by treating your taste buds to some high protein nut butter from Nuts ‘N More. This nutritious and tasty treat provides 11 grams of protein per serving and comes in delicious flavors like “banana nut” and “apple crisp”.

Experience unparalleled comfort while writing by swapping your plain pen for the Ko-Axis Rail Pen. The flat rectangular shape and rounded edges of this unique writing utensil provide a greater surface area than cylindrical pens – resulting in a more ergonomic feel.

Spice up your dull wine and cheese nights by serving your fermented grape juice from this amazing dragon shaped wine decanter. This remarkable decanter is expertly crafted from thick cut lead-free glass into an imposing 1200 ml capacity dragon.

Keep your playful kitty cat entertained for minutes on end with the Mousr robotic mouse cat toy. Named best new cat product of 2019 by the America Pet Products Association, it comes with 3 unique playing modes and can automatically sense and react to your feline friend.

Keep your dog from freaking out during loud storms with these CBD dog treats. These yummy snacks will help your doggy calm down and relax during loud and other stressful situations so that you can maintain a peaceful and quiet environment in your home.

Add some whimsy to your workspace by keeping your pencils nice and pointy with this beaver pencil sharpener. Simply place your dull or new pencil inside this cute little busy beaver’s mouth and he’ll quickly sharpen it into the perfect point.

Enjoy your backyard year-round by hanging out inside this transparent polycarbonate greenhouse. Apart from housing plants, this weather-proof greenhouse is large enough to fit an entire table and chair set, making it ideal for gardeners who also love to entertain.

What better way to keep your literary collection safe and organized than by placing it between these imposing dragon bookends? These brilliantly designed bookends are crafted from polyresin with a felt base and make the perfect gift for any fantasy-loving bookworm.

Cultivate an atmosphere of serenity in your humble abode by planting your very own blue maple bonsai tree. The seeds of this beautiful and rare bonsai are relatively easy to plant and grow – making it an ideal gift for novice bonsai enthusiasts.

With this blanket fort building kit your little ones will easily be able to turn almost any part of their room into their own private fortress of solitude. Each zany toy in the set can be used as a connector so that your kid can quickly attach their bed sheets to nearby furniture.

Keep your hands from getting ripped up and blistered when you pump some iron by walking into the gym with the world’s best hand grips. They come with a custom wrist strap for improved comfort and are made from genuine leather for superior support and durability.

Set the world on fire with these Earth shaped fire pits. Each of these eye-catching fire pits is hand cut from durable carbon steel with an iron oxide finish that will provide you with years of aesthetically pleasing yet functional fires.

This Gremlins Gizmo Chia Pet is probably the only Mogwai that you actually want to expose to bright lights and water. This cute little Gizmo takes about 1 to 2 weeks to grow a lush green coat that will add a geeky and humorous flair to any room in your home.

Stay warm and toasty by igniting a flame with the fire starting flint shoelaces. Ideal for hiking and outdoorsy type footwear, the tip of each shoelace comes capped in rubber and houses a small ferro rod to help you get a flame started.

Make the most out of your next flight by upgrading to the DJI smart drone controller. It automatically switches between 2.4 and 5.8 GHz to reduce environmental interference and boasts a 5.5″ 1080p screen that displays crisp images even in adverse weather.

Feel like royalty next time you decide to pamper yourself by putting on one of these Disney princess sheet face masks. These fun and whimsical masks are available in delightful varieties like a cucumber infused Ariel mask or a lavender infused Aurora mask.

Ensure your most valuable possessions remain safe while you’re out-and-about by stashing them inside these secret storage compartment insoles. The heel of each insole features a small built-in compartment ideal for storing small things like house keys and spare cash.

Throw out those unsightly and bulky doorstops once and for all by upgrading to this hidden magnetic doorstop. It installs in mere minutes, is compatible with any type of floor surface, and fits discreetly underneath your door, eliminating possible tripping hazards.

Customize all your possessions by plastering your beautiful mug all over them using these personalized face stickers. They’re made from high quality matte vinyl and are both microwave and dishwasher safe, meaning you can stick them on virtually anything.

Brighten up drab rainy days in true wine aficionado fashion with this Cabernet wine bottle hidden umbrella. The clever design disguises the umbrella like a run-of-the-mill wine bottle complete with a custom label that reads “Brella Vineyards Cabernet”.

Sleep soundly and more relaxed than ever by placing the weighted sleep mask over your eyes before hitting the hay. The mask comes filled with soothing microbeads that provide a gentle pressure aimed at reducing stress and anxiety while you slumber.

Give your EDC a fun twist by latching your keys onto this mini thumb finger cuffs keychain. This fun novelty keychain sports a pair of mini thumb cuffs that are equipped with a safety latch so that you can easily open them up even if you’ve lost the tiny keys.

Start out your fiesta with a boozy bang by serving yourself a refreshing Margarita in this giant glass. This ginormous glass stands over a foot tall – making it the perfect way to share your savory cocktail with all your party friends.

Get your bachelorette party started off on the right note with a rousing game of Dick Match! This thrilling party game works like a NSFW version of the memory matching game – where players match up beautifully illustrated peens that appear on each cardboard tile.

titleEN: The Beautiful Poetry Of Donald Trump
content: Get to know the thoughtful and sensitive man that hides deep, deep, deep beneath Number 45’s brazen and cocksure exterior by reading The Beautiful Poetry of Donald Trump. Experience his best tweets and quotes, rearranged into beautiful poems and haikus.

Get your fill of protein and flavor by snacking on these savory salt and vinegar grasshoppers. Made with 100% real crickets, these delectable little critters are deep fried and then topped off with a finger-likin’ good combination of salt and vinegar that’ll thrill your taste buds.

Forget cutesy ponies and get your fearless little tike on top of one of these fearsome looking ride-on rocking monsters! Each terrifying beast is crafted from solid birch plywood and comes available in either a ghost, octopus, or shark design.

Keep order in your bedroom by placing your most-used items and gadgets on this bedside shelf. It easily clamps onto the side of your bed without scratching the frame in order to provide you with a flat and sturdy surface perfect for everything from your laptop to your mug.

Take the guess work out of cutting perfectly even slices by dividing your cheesy pie using this equal slice pizza cutter. Crafted from durable 18 gauge stainless steel, this handy pizza accessory will let you cut your tasty pie into equal slices in one fluid motion.

Place a fun twist on the way you hydrate by pouring your favorite beverage inside this twisting silicone lid travel mug. As you turn the top part of the mug, the unique silicone lid slowly begins to open or close – allowing you to lock it in place at different intervals.

Make your backyard a more comfortable, cozy, and whimsical place for your rugrats with this kids tree tops furniture set. This creatively styled set is accented with a series of friendly woodland creatures at the base and is made from weather-resistant polycarbonate.

If you enjoy humor, good stories, and great food you’ll love A Very Serious Cookbook. The dynamic duo behind NYC-based restaurants Contra and Wildair share dozens of tasty recipes while giving you a behind-the-scene glimpse at their two famed eateries.

Turn any sunny location into the ideal place for some rest and relaxation by setting up the palm island hammock stand. Now you’ll be able to conveniently set up a comfy and breezy hammock – even if there are no existing trees or posts around.

Keep your most-used personal items handy at all times by placing them inside this reusable adhesive pocket storage. It comes with an adhesive backing that easily sticks onto any flat and dust-free surface making it ideal for everywhere from your desk to your laptop.

Marvel at the awesome power of the T-Rex next time thirst strikes by opening up your drink using this T-Rex bottle opener. This cast iron T-Rex measures around 5 inches tall and comes with his fearsome jaws open at the perfect angle to pop open a cold brew or soda pop.

Avoid exhausting yourself and freezing your poor little fingers off by placing the SnowOFF car windshield snow cover on your ride. It covers the entire windshield so that you can easily peel it off, shake it off, and get on with your day.

Give your smoking routine some geeky flair by sparking up with this neat Game Boy Zippo lighter. This cool little refillable lighter is wind-proof and comes in a retro Game Boy styled casing that makes this a must-have for any old school gamer who enjoys the occasional puff.

The AirRunner Treadmill is the lightweight cardio machine that runs on pure human power. This home gym must-have is powered by your movement, meaning that you can easily and intuitively change speeds at will just by slowing down or speeding up your running.

Make quick work of the giant pile of logs in the yard by cutting them in record time by using the smart wooden log splitter. This high-quality tool helps you effortlessly split wooden logs using minimal force and without breaking your back.

Relieve debilitating back pain in as little as 5 minutes a day by using the Plexus back pain relief wheel. Available in 3 sizes, this useful tool will help alleviate discomfort by releasing pinched nerves, reduce bulging discs, and restore the natural curvature of the spine.

Throw away those muggle-infested blankets and get yourself one of these magical Hogwarts houses wearable throw blankets! Made of soft & luxurious fleece with oversized loose fitting sleeves, it’ll shield you from the cold while leaving your hands free to cast spells!

titleEN: Umbrella Girl Don’t Be A Salty Bitch Mug
content: Spice up your coffee breaks with some humor by pouring your hot beverage in this umbrella girl “don’t be a salty bitch” mug. This comical novelty mug comes with the iconic Morton’s Salt girl printed on both sides for all to see.

How To Invent Everything is the indispensable “how to” manual no time traveler should be without! This humorous yet captivating and informative read shows you everything you’ll need to know in order to invent all the modern conveniences we take for granted.

Enjoy a five star breakfast from the comfort of your own home by using the rolled omelet pan to prepare it. This specialized pan comes covered in a non-stick coating and features a unique shaped surface that makes preparing gourmet omelets a breeze.

Get instant and long-lasting relief from headaches and migraines by strapping in The Headache Hat. It comes equipped with a thin plastic strip that prevents the ice from melting on you instantly while also offering a comfortable flex fit that is ideal for prolonged use.
